channel.title: CVE Feed for TMS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TMS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-29427|2024-08-02T14:07:45.942Z -- tms -- booking%20for%20appointments%20and%20events%20calendar%20%E2%80%93%20amelia
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in TMS Booking for Appointments and Events Calendar – Amelia plugin <= 1.0.75 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-27918|2024-08-02T12:23:30.199Z -- tms -- appointment%20and%20event%20booking%20calendar%20for%20wordpress%20-%20amelia
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Appointment and Event Booking Calendar for WordPress - Amelia versions prior to 1.0.76 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script by having a user who is logging in the WordPress where the product is installed visit a malicious URL.

item.title: CVE-2024-22298|2024-08-01T22:43:34.283Z -- tms -- amelia
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in TMS Amelia ameliabooking.This issue affects Amelia: from n/a through 1.0.98.

item.title: CVE-2024-31425|2024-06-04T17:36:50.068Z -- tms -- amelia
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in TMS Amelia.This issue affects Amelia: from n/a through 1.0.95.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in TMS Amelia ameliabooking.This issue affects Amelia: from n/a through 1.0.98.
